title: Same champions in ARURF
body:
I just feel every game of ARURF has the same champions

There are like 10 - 15 champions that keep popping up all the time. Also fun ones like Orianna or Ahri rarely come up...

Due to this the game mode is getting boring and repetitive 

Could there also be a block option where you can block a champion or champions for 3 games or so...
